name: ERGONAVID
description:
In this top-down survival adventure, you are awakened from suspended animation by the automated system of a ship doomed into deep space. Equipped with your scanner and darts, it's up to you to restore main power and finish your mission. Just watch out for what's left of the crew. Their senses are particularly acute.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • R - Scanner
  • F - Dart Launcher
  • Space - Interact
  • Click - Interact

Credits:

  • Ahsan Istamar - Game Design, Programming
  • Dafi Sulthan Iskandar - Game Design, Art (2D), SFX
  • Raihana Kamila - Art (2D)
  • Andrew Julian Hanjaya - Art (2D)
  • Antony - Programming
  • Jhongson - Programming
